display_long_description:
Flush Away the Competition!

Step into the hilariously addictive VR experience, Toilet Toss!

It is your go-to party game where precision meets chaos in fast, head-to-head matches. Master your throws, outwit your opponent, and dominate the leaderboard in this vibrant arcade world.

🎯 Toss, Target, Triumph:
Aim and toss objects with precision to score big. Hit bonus targets to unleash obstacles and throw your opponent off their game. Quick reflexes and smart strategies are your ticket to victory.

⏱️ 60 Seconds of Mayhem:
Fast-paced rounds keep the action intense, making Toilet Toss perfect for quick sessions or hours of endless fun.

🤝 Social, Competitive, Unforgettable:
Challenge your friends in thrilling 1v1 matches. With every toss, laugh, and win, Toilet Toss brings the party to VR like never before.

✨ Quirky, Colorful, and Immersive:
Dive into a colorful competitive world and climb the leaderboard!

Get ready to aim, toss, and flush your way to glory.

Get Toilet Toss now and let the games begin!
